column1: mahAyAna paTa sADana saFgrahaH namaH sarva budDa boDisattveByaH
column2: @302b # // rgya gar skad du /ma h'a y'a na pa th'a s'a dha na sam gra ha / bod skad du / theg pa chen po lam gyi sgrub thabs shin tu bsdus pa / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //

column1: sarva atIta Adya budDAnAm janaka tvAt pitarO taTA BaktyA sADana DarmAH ca vAc cittAByAm mudA nataH
column2: 'das dang da ltar bde gshegs kun // skyed pa'i yab dang yum gyur pa // sgrub pa'i chos la rab gus shing // ngag @303a * // yid dang bas phyag 'tshal lo // bsam gyis mi khyab che ba mnga' //

column1: acintyAm mahatIm boDim jiGRkzuH ced anuttarAm
column2: bla ma byang chub thob 'dod na //

column1: boDeH sADana nizWa tvAt sADanam sArataH Bajet
column2: byang chub bsgrub la rag las pas // sgrub pa lhur blang snying por bya //

column1: sa ca tri SaraNam gattvA nivArya sakala aSuBAn
column2: de yis gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing // mi dge kun las ldog pa yis //

column1: aDiSIlam Bajet SudDam boDi cittasya vAhanam
column2: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dag par bsrung // byang chub sems kyi bzhon pa la // brten nas 'chi ba rjes dran gyi //

column1: ASritya kaSayA BUyas tAxayan maraNa smRteH
column2: lcag ni yang dang yang brdab cing //

column1: Bava mArga mahABItim krAmeta enam ca satvaram
column2: srid lam 'jigs pa che sa yi // lam 'di myur du 'das byas la //

column1: aBaya budDa BU prAptaH praNiDAna pade sTitaH
column2: 'jigs med sangs rgyas sar phyin bya // smon pa'i gzhi la gnas pa yis ; / sems dpa'i sdom pa rab bzung zhing //

column1: sattva saMvaram ADAya zaw ca pAramitA AdikAH
column2: pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa //

column1: sattva caryAH caret tadvat tad prajQA upAya saFgraham
column2: sems dpa'i spyod pa tshul bzhin spyad // de bsdus thabs dang shes rab la //

column1: Sikzeta AsTita nirvANam tad sAraH dviviDaH taTA rAga drarya rahitaH nityam pAvaka arTI taTA araNim
column2: mi gnas mya ngan 'das phyir bslab // de yi snying po rnam pa gnyis // me don gnyer bas gtsub shing ltar // chags pa'i ldan dang bral ba yis //

column1: BAvayet satatam BaktyA budDaH SIGram tatas Bavet
column2: rtag tu rgyun ldan gus par bsgom // de yis myur du de 'tshang rgya //

column1: para arTa maNi vat nityam anABogam karoti saH
column2: nor bu bzhin du gzhan gyi don // lhun gyis grub par de byed 'gyur //

column1: mahAyAnasya SikzeyuH DanyAH sADana saFgraham
column2: theg chen sgrub thabs bsdus 'di la // skal ldan rnams kyis legs par bslab // snying la bdud rtsi'i thigs pa chags //

column1: cittam suDA lavEH raktam budDaySudDO ca duHspRSam
column2: blo ma sbyangs pas blos reg dka' //

column1: etat saFgraha puNyena jagat yAtu mahApaTam
column2: 'di bsdus dge bas 'gro ba kun // theg chen sgrub pa lhur len shog /

column1: budDa BUmim aham ca AptvA Baveyam loka nAyakaH   a ba
column2: bdag kyang sangs rgyas sa thob nas // 'gro ba'i 'dren pa byed par shog /

column1: ati saMkzipta mahAyAna paTa sADanam mahA AcArya dIpaFkara SrI jQAna viracitam samAptam
column2: theg pa chen po lam gyi sgrub thabs shin tu bsdus pa / slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /

column1: BAratasya tena eva upADyAya paNxitena loka cakzuzA BikzuNA kalyANa matinA dge vahi blaH groH
